text: The greenish puffleg (Haplophaedia aureliae) is a species of hummingbird. It is found in Colombia, Ecuador, and Panama. Its habitats are subtropical or tropical moist montanes and fairly degraded former forests. == References == * BirdLife International 2008. . 2008 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 12 Juni 2009. Category:Birds of Central America Category:Birds of South America Category:Hummingbirds
title: Greenish puffleg
